segments.text: There are many new kinds of newspapers . I find it hard to choose among them . Which is the most popular paper circulating in our city ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd recommend you the Morning Paper , it is true that the paper is a newly issued one , but its circulation is rising . Last month , it reached to three hundred thousand , which is a very good figure for a new paper .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What's the reason that people prefer to read this one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think perhaps the news stories in it are truthful and accurate . It also has a special page about the stock market ; maybe this is the real reason for its popularity . Many people are now speculating in the stock market .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can predict it will have the largest circulation in one or two years .
segments.speaker: S1
